rule.name: js/user-controlled-bypass
rule.full_description: Conditions that the user controls are not suited for making security-related decisions.

message.text:
This condition guards a sensitive action, but a user-provided value controls it.
This condition guards a sensitive action, but a user-provided value controls it.

rule.name: js/missing-rate-limiting
rule.full_description: An HTTP request handler that performs expensive operations without restricting the rate at which operations can be carried out is vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.

message.text: This route handler performs authorization, but is not rate-limited.
